title: Anivia (rework)
body:
Why did you have to break her so much? Compared to the other reworks, you basically killed her. Her ult is literally useless for the whole point it was for, AOE slow and harass at 6 to make up for her not so strong early game. Now she just gets out traded in possibly every way. 

Main champ since start of Season 2 and will probably never play her again because now since ANYTHING MID is more viable than her.

replies.body:
I don't play Anivia, but I read her notes as a buff.

I'm assuming that your tears are over the ult? It STARTS at 150 range, which should not be hard to land considering it is instant. It then increases to its original size over 3 seconds. It also has a 60% slow at max rank/size, which is a huge buff on 20%.
Her Q has a 50% buff on stun duration and the same slow as her ult. Her E has a much nicer missile speed and longer range. Her Auto attacks have a quicker, easier speed too. I mean, is it THAT HARD to click on the ground within 150 range of your enemy?

Sure it looks like she's gonna be doing less damage. but if you think that getting out traded makes her trash and overwhelms her much greater utility then i doubt you're a real anivia main

> Sure it looks like she's gonna be doing less damage. but if you think that getting out traded makes her trash and overwhelms her much greater utility then i doubt you're a real anivia main

I agree with this I'm an Anivia main and i feel a difference but she doesn't feel weak its going to take little to get use to going closer to e into ultimate BUT her ultimate is a lot stronger 50% more damage more slow and a HUGE width when charged up.

I play Anivia when I can, since ya know I often fill a lot and don't get mid often. 

Anyways I just wanted to say that the E range was indeed shortened, but they changed it so that you didn't have to hit the center of their hitbox as opposed to the outer edge of the hitbox which I always thought felt really awkward before.

As an Anivia main, I welcome the changes and she will still remain my main because:
- She ain't broken?
- She literally plays and builds no different.
- Her ult is now STRONGER.
- Her stun on Q is LONGER.
- If you frakk up a Q, you can still drop you ult under them and E for 'tonnes of damage. The casting range is the same to use for escapes, using it offensively you gotta get a little closer to get it under them, who cares, ult - E - Ignite for kill anyway.  or  - use your damn wall like you're supposed to.
